dct_title_s: Economic map of Iran = Carta economico della Iran
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by shading. Insets: Iran, agriculture, livestock, vegetation -- Road map of Iran. Pictorial map. Shows: textile, food, metal, chemical, oil industries with symbols, ports and hydro-electric stations. Persian, English and Italian; cataloging based on English data. Includes advertisements for Caspian, an Italian company selling Persian rugs.
dct_publisher_sm: Tehran, Iran : Sahab Geographic & Drafting Institute, [ca. 1960]
